messages.subject: Re: unschooling pen pal
messages.msgSnippet: --There is  a homeschool pen pal group that you can join to get pen pals for email and snail mail for homeschool parents and homeschool children all over the
messages.messageBody:
--There is a homeschool pen pal group that you can join to get pen
pals for email and snail mail for homeschool parents and homeschool
children all over the world:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/homeschoolpen-pals/

Pebs


- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "graberamy" <graber@...> wrote:
>
> Hey all,
>
> I've done a search on pen pals in these archives but couldn't find
> what I wanted. So, I hope this is ok to post here. My daughter has
> been reading some of my unschooling list with me and now she's
> interested in having a unschooling pen pal (that she doesn't know
> IRL). My daughter is 10 almost 11 and we live in Iowa. Feel free to
> email me privately or if you know of a link to a group that'd be great
> to see!
>
> I'll apologize now, if I shouldn't be posting this here!
>
> amy g
>

messages.subject: unschooling pen pal
messages.msgSnippet: Hey all, I ve done a search on pen pals in these archives but couldn t find what I wanted.  So, I hope this is ok to post here.  My daughter has been reading
messages.messageBody:
Hey all,

I've done a search on pen pals in these archives but couldn't find
what I wanted. So, I hope this is ok to post here. My daughter has
been reading some of my unschooling list with me and now she's
interested in having a unschooling pen pal (that she doesn't know
IRL). My daughter is 10 almost 11 and we live in Iowa. Feel free to
email me privately or if you know of a link to a group that'd be great
to see!

I'll apologize now, if I shouldn't be posting this here!

amy g
